dialog.text: What town do you wish to import? (0 - {{max-num}})
Enter a town number and hit OK, and you will be asked to select a scenario file. The town with that number in the selected scenario will then be loaded in over the current town.
Warning: This will write over the town currently in memory. Also, the town you select must be the same size (large/medium/small) as the town currently in memory.
